H0.text: Which writer's first works were gathered into a series of short stories called "Plain Tales From The Hills" in the 1880s?". Rudyard Kipling's contemporary, W.W. Jacobs

H1.text: Which writer's first works were gathered into a series of short stories called "Plain Tales From The Hills" in the 1880s?". H.G. Wells

H2.text: Which writer's first works were gathered into a series of short stories called "Plain Tales From The Hills" in the 1880s?". Arthur Conan Doyle

H3.text: Which writer's first works were gathered into a series of short stories called "Plain Tales From The Hills" in the 1880s?". Kipling
